header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED ON CONSIDERATION OF COMMONS AMENDMENTS

text.quote: 000: Clause 6, line 7, after “proceedings)” insert “and such disclosure would be damaging to the interests of national security”
000: Clause 6, line 25, leave out from “conditions” to end of line 26
000: After Clause 6, line 7, leave out “effective” and insert “open”
000: After Clause 6, line 11, leave out “effective administration of justice in the proceedings” and insert “open administration of justice”
000: After Clause 6, line 19, leave out “effective administration of justice in the proceedings” and insert “open administration of justice”
